name: Guest
description:
This is a short visual novel made in Ren'Py that is based on the song Guest by Gavin Castleton.

No jump scares.

This should take 10-15 minute for a playthrough. There is a second, more obscure ending to get. Good luck!

--------------------

text written by: beepsalt

based on the song "Guest" written by Gavin Castleton https://open.spotify.com/album/3RupM29Tkz9CjIQGhpOHlK?si=Ap3Zrsz-RF2_a9TAPxz_hg 

images created in Midjourney by beepsalt

font is https://datagoblin.itch.io/monogram
